entry.title: SAP Build Process Automation: Create an Automation to Extract Data
entry.content:
Hello,

I am trying to follow the tutorial provided in the link - https://developers.sap.com/tutorials/spa-create-automation.html#ccccd52c-2a13-402b-a748-61f93dff8b62 for a demo and I am dependent on the free trial version.

However when I am trying to follow the step - 2 To open the Excel Instance: and trying to drag the open excel activity I found it is not getting dragged and greyed out but that is contrary to the content of the tutorial. Can you help me? 

 

The open and close excel activities are not working as described in the tutorial steps.

I uploaded as much pictures to give context but I don't where I should, if you can help I would appreciate it! Thank you

I am trying to loop (for each) + use condition on the above "obj" but it does nothing (runs only once). Something like stepXcurrentMember[1, rate] that usually works when looping over guy tables seems not working here.

Many thanks.

entry.title: SAP Build Process Automation Deployment Time Out

Hi all,

I try deploy a automation project in SAP Build Process Automation. After some time result in Timeout error:

The SBPA service is in Region US10. The api endpoint https://spa-api-gateway-bpi-us-prod.cfapps.us10.hana.ondemand.com

i'm thinking this is a general problem with the ABAP service.

Is anyone having a similar issue? If so, did you find the cause of it?

entry.title: Enable SAP Build Process Automation Workflow Integration with SAP Fiori My Inbox S4H Private cloud
entry.content:
We are implementing a Business Partner Creation Approval workflow using SAP Build Process Automation (BPA) on SAP BTP(Standard content is available). Our architecture is based on SAP S/4HANA Private Cloud and we aim to:

  • Integrate BPA workflows directly into the SAP Fiori My Inbox of the S/4HANA system.
  • Trigger workflows from a custom application within S/4HANA, without using SAP Build Workzone.

Need to check the following possibility

  • Possible for integrating BPA workflows with SAP Fiori My Inbox in S/4HANA Private Cloud?
  • Enablement of workflow triggers from custom apps via API , without dependency on SAP Build Workzone?

This integration will streamline workflow approvals within our existing Fiori Launchpad, reduce dependency on additional UI layers, and improve user adoption.

entry.title: Issue in SAP BPA Standard Flow “Automatic Creation of Sales Order from Unstructured Data (5LT)”
entry.content:
Hello experts,

We are implementing the SAP Build Process Automation (BPA) standard content “Automatic Creation of Sales Order from Unstructured Data (5LT)” to automatically create sales orders in SAP from customer documents received via email.

However, we are facing an issue of email Signature Images Also Getting Posted in Sales Order Request

This leads to unnecessary attachments being processed and posted in SAP.

What we have checked so far

  • The incoming email to BPA includes one main PDF (order document) and multiple inline PNG files from the sender’s signature.

  • The BPA flow processes all attachments together without filtering based on file type or content.

Our questions

  1. Is there a standard way in this BPA flow to filter attachments so that only relevant documents (e.g., PDFs) are considered for processing?

  2. If not, what is the recommended approach or extension point to add such filtering logic?

Any pointers or configuration guidance would be appreciated.

Thanks & Regards
Aman Mittal

entry.title: SBPA failed when use "Rest Call Web Service with Destination" activity
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I tried to use "Rest Call Web Service with Destination" to call web service with destination ES5.

But it always failed with following error:

"Test Outlook job started before irpa_core.request.restCallWebServiceWithDestination activity ended. Missing await ?"
"Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'prefixUrl')",
 
The destination is passed through environment variable, and the destination is maintained in BTP and SBPA - Destination tile.
 
Any help  to achieve this would be greatly appreciated!
 
Thanks,
Pamela

entry.title: SAP S4/hana public cloud RAP to SAP build automation workflow
entry.content:
Hi Guys, We’re currently working with the Budget Approval Template Workflow Budget Approval and its working from sample app on BTP.

At this moment we are developing Custom RAP on S4/hana Cloud abap stack, that will need to create this Workflow(  im following 
https://developers.sap.com/tutorials/abap-environment-sbpa-workflow-integration..html and 

https://community.sap.com/t5/technology-blog-posts-by-sap/integrate-sap-build-process-automation-with-custom-business-object-from-s/ba-p/13918965

I have the RAP running, and the method to trigger the workflow is implemented 

   TRY.
             MODIFY ENTITIES OF i_cpwf_inst
                ENTITY CPWFInstance "Changed#RD
                EXECUTE registerWorkflowStart
                FROM VALUE #( ( %key-CpWfHandle      =    cl_system_uuid=>create_uuid_x16_static( )
                             %param-RetentionTime = wf_retention_days 
                             %param-PaWfDefId     = my_wf_defid ( id is correct)
                             %param-CallbackClass = callback_class
                             %param-Consumer      = consumer ) )
                MAPPED   DATA(mapped_wf)
                FAILED   DATA(failed_wf)
                REPORTED DATA(reported_wf).

         IF mapped_wf IS NOT INITIAL.

          "Map the fields to the outgoing context.
*          DATA(context)   = VALUE ty_wf_context(  ).

          " Set the workflow context for the new workflow instances
          TRY.
              DATA(lo_cpwf_api) = cl_swf_cpwf_api_factory_a4c=>get_api_instance( ).
              DATA(json_conv) = lo_cpwf_api->get_json_converter(  ).
              DATA(context_json) = json_conv->serialize( data = is_my)wf_context_context ).
            CATCH cx_swf_cpwf_api INTO DATA(lx_swf_api).
          ENDTRY.

*      *pass the Payload to workflow
           MODIFY ENTITIES OF i_cpwf_inst
            ENTITY CPWFInstance
            EXECUTE setPayload
            FROM VALUE #( ( %key-CpWfHandle = mapped_wf-cpwfinstance[ 1 ]-CpWfHandle
                           %param-context  = context_json ) )
                 MAPPED   mapped_wf
                 FAILED   failed_wf
                 REPORTED reported_wf ##NO_LOCAL_MODE.

          ENDIF.
         CATCH cx_uuid_error.

Communication Arrangment is SAP_COM_0863 is set up

When im creating the RAP method is called and i dont have errors/exceptions .  But the WF on Build automation is not created.

On Outbound Communitction i can see http 404 :

Probably im missing some configuration,

this path /public/workflow/rest/v1/workflow-instances , when i running the standalone template app on BTP i need to set also the  environmentId ->

/v1/workflow-instances?environmentId=myenvID  Should i set this somewhere on communication arrangment? 

any other possible issue on this configuration??

entry.title: Dynamic Handling of Credentials in SAP BPA
entry.content:
Hi everyone,
I am trying to build an automation which accesses various S/4HANA Instances with different credentials depending who started it or which desktop agent started it. I dont want to ask the user to input their credentials. Is there a good way of handling credentials dynamically in SAP BPA?

entry.title: Sequentially Retry HTTP Calls (Re-Read ETag and Repost on Error) in SAP Build Process Automation
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I’m working on an SAP Build Process Automation workflow that requires handling retries for a failed HTTP call in a sequential manner.

Here’s my current setup:

  • I first read the ETag using an HTTP GET request.

  • Then, I post a Goods Issue using that ETag.

  • Sometimes the Post Goods Issue call fails because the ETag becomes outdated.
    In that case, I need to reread the ETag and retry the Post request with the new ETag.

I’ve tried using a Branch step with “Continue on Error” enabled, and while it does allow the retry to trigger, it runs the branches in parallel.


This causes both the failed and successful calls to execute simultaneously, which isn’t ideal.

Is there an alternative way to handle this error scenario sequentially within the workflow?

entry.title: SAP Build Process Automation reading Excel data from Sharepoint using Microsoft 365 Cloud SDK
entry.content:
I am building an automation in SAP Build Process Automation that should automatically read data from an Excel file stored in SharePoint. I used this tutorial: https://developers.sap.com/tutorials/spa-office-integration-agent..html

Previously, I used the “Get Remote File Information” activity, where I could directly provide the file URL to specify the exact Excel file in SharePoint.

Now, I want to modify my process so that it automatically retrieves the most recently added Excel file from the same SharePoint location (instead of using a fixed link), so I tried to replace “Get Remote File Information” with “Get Recent Files”.

However, the “Get Recent Files” activity does not have a field for entering a SharePoint URL or folder path, so I am not sure how to define the correct source location from which the automation should fetch the file. I also don't know how to adjust properly the new parameters, didn't see any tutorials on the Internet regarding this..

entry.title: How to get nested index in SAP Build Process Automation loop for each?
entry.content:
Hi, I have automation as follows:

I am looping through list of values from excel column. I need to count index only in case the condition is met. But index is counted all the time when it gets through the loop as its based on the initial values. How to create some index variable that counts from 0 only when condition is met? Thank you.
